meanings.sent1: I bought new cortinas for my bedroom windows.
meanings.sent2: The cortinas in the living room block out the sunlight beautifully.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat got tangled in the cortinas and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: The cortinas danced in the breeze like graceful performers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cortinas added a cheerful touch to the room.

meanings.sent1: She sewed the cortinas herself to match the room decor.
meanings.sent2: The elegant cortinas in the theater added to the grandeur of the performance.
meanings.sent3: The cortinas swayed gently as the wind whispered through the window.
meanings.sent4: Her words fell like heavy cortinas, silencing the room.
meanings.sent5: The velvet cortinas felt luxurious to the touch.
